channel.title: Lostcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: HTML5 Game Development Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
channel.itunes:summary: Geoff Blair and Matt Hackett discuss the business, tech and creativity of HTML5 games.
channel.description: Geoff Blair and Matt Hackett discuss the business, tech and creativity of HTML5 games.

item.title: Lostcast Episode 1: Hello World
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Introduction and Onslaught! development
item.itunes:summary: Matt and Geoff discuss their backgrounds and various aspects of Onslaught! development.

item.title: Lostcast Episode 2: Code Like a Fox
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Louis Stowasser of Crafty HTML5 game engine
item.itunes:summary: Matt and Geoff talk with HTML5 game developer Louis Stowasser about his Crafty game engine.

item.title: Lostcast Episode 3: Ramble On
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Join us as we ramble on about locking down your HTML5 game's source code
item.itunes:summary: Join us as we ramble on about locking down your HTML5 game's source code

item.title: Lostcast Episode 4: Native Coffee
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: What's NaCl and why does it kind of scare us?
item.itunes:summary: What's NaCl and why does it kind of scare us?
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, nacl, native client, coffeescript

item.title: Lostcast Episode 5: Left 4 Questions
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: EMAIL!
item.itunes:summary: We answer 4 HTML5 game dev questions from a listener.

item.title: Lostcast Episode 6: A Wild Tom Appears
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Tom Fairfield of Game Closure.
item.itunes:summary: Tom discusses xcjs, Game Closure and HTML5 tech.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, game closure, tom fairfield

item.title: Lostcast Episode 7: HTML5 The Bad Parts
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: What sucks about HTML5?
item.itunes:summary: We collected things devs hate about HTML5 via Twitter and talk all about them!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, suck, sucks, sucking, sucky

item.title: Lostcast Episode 8: Attack of the Clones!
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: The clones! They're at the door!
item.itunes:summary: With so many companies cloning out companies' games, why don't we talk this out?

item.title: Lostcast Episode 9: That's Rich
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Flash or HTML5?
item.itunes:summary: Rich Davey is a veteran flash game developer and is really excited about HTML5. Let's talk it out!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, flash, comparison, rich davey, photonstorm

item.title: Lostcast Episode 10: Indiependence Day
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: We've gone indie!
item.itunes:summary: LDG is now a full-on indie game company and we celebrate by open sourcing our flagship product.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, indie, onslaught, onslaught arena, open source

item.title: Lostcast Episode 11: LDG @ GDC
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: We were at GDC 'n stuff
item.itunes:summary: LDG went to GDC where we wont a contest and other exciting stuff happened.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, indie, gdc, lava sword

item.title: Lostcast Episode 12: Arnother Interview
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Another interview! This time with Arno van der Vegt.
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt talk shop with HTML5 performance expert and Game Closure employee Arno van der Vegt.

item.title: Lostcast Episode 13: OS Xcellence
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Why is Geoff's OS X developer experience so great?
item.itunes:summary: Matt and Geoff talk about pimping out OS X and HTML games and all that!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, indie, os x, browserquest, open source

item.title: Lostcast Episode 14: Quite an Impact
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: The Onslaught! guys and the Biolab guy!
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt interview Impact game engine creator Dominic Szablewski.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, impact, game engine, biolab disaster, interview, gamedev

item.title: Lostcast Episode 15: Deus Ex Game Mechanics
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Deus Ex Game Mechanics
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt talk about lots of things HTML5 and game related, but mostly talk about interesting game mechanics!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, mechanics, gamedev, podcast

item.title: Lostcast Episode 16: We Heart Huckaby
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: We Heart Huckaby
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt talk with HTML5 game pioneer Joseph Huckaby, creator of Effect Games.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, joseph huckaby, effect games

item.title: Lostcast Episode 17: Vincent Priceless
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Vincent Priceless
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt talk with veteran game and Chrome developer Vincent Scheib.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, vincent sheib, chrome

item.title: Lostcast Episode 18: The Sorceror's Sponsor
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: The Sorceror's Sponsor
item.itunes:summary: Announcing our first sponsor: Pokki! Geoff and Matt talk about how awesome HTML5 gaming is right now.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, pokki

item.title: Lostcast Episode 10: Canvas Story
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Canvas Story
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt answer a listener question about canvas scaling and catch you up on all things LDG. Don't forget to check out our sponsor Pokki!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, canvas, pokki
